snippet: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
abstract: A collection of links from the reporters and editors of the Dining section.
lead_paragraph: Condé Nast Traveler: Caramelized olives on a tree. Fruit and oysters floating in solidified cava. Grilled sole that made a magazine editor weep. Eucalyptus ice cream. A mesmerizing slide show of dishes from El Celler de Can Roca, which, now that El Bulli has closed, just might be the best restaurant in Spain. -- Jeff Gordinier
